hero.subtitle: Join our student club, develop projects, expand your network and make your mark in the technology world.

features.subtitle: Everything you need to develop yourself in the field of technology is here

education.title: Education and Organization
education.description1: The Education and Organization Department organizes both social and technical training programs needed by engineering students. It also deals with the organization of HEBOCON, GameJam and our signature event SOF.
education.description2: Our department provides comprehensive educational opportunities by supporting both academic and social development of students. In addition to technical skills, training is also provided in leadership, teamwork and project management.

corporate.title: Corporate Relations
corporate.description1: By organizing EsTalks and technical trips, it aims to provide students with professional networks and become more equipped individuals. At the same time, finding speakers for major events is under the responsibility of the Corporate Relations department.
corporate.description2: Our department acts as a bridge between industry professionals and students and creates career opportunities. It organizes company visits, networking events and mentorship programs.

media.title: Media and Promotion
media.description1: It manages all media accounts of the club and uses these channels effectively. It also undertakes social media PR; responsible for designing and editing content to be shared.
media.description2: Our department increases the visibility of the club and raises its brand value. We have a specialized team in graphic design, video production, social media management and content strategy.

sponsorship.title: Sponsorship
sponsorship.description1: It ensures that the club establishes connections with companies, tradesmen and all firms that are sponsor candidates. Almost all of the club's financial needs are met by the sponsorship department.
sponsorship.description2: Our department supports the growth of the club by creating sustainable financial resources. It plays an active role in sponsor relationship management, project financing and budget planning.

hr.title: Human Resources
hr.description1: It is responsible for adding members to the club and providing a more social environment by organizing social activities and social responsibility projects. Also, part of the PR work of major events planned to be organized is the duty of the Human Resources department.
hr.description2: Our department increases member satisfaction by strengthening the club culture. It organizes team spirit, motivation and personal development activities.

club.title: About the Club
club.description: ESOES is a dynamic student club focused on technology and innovation. We provide students with practical experience and networking opportunities.
club.content: We train the leaders of the future with modern approaches and current technologies.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.description: To enable students to develop themselves in the field of technology and prepare them for the industry.
vision.content: Innovation, collaboration and continuous learning form the foundation of our values.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: To contribute to students' careers by creating quality education, practical projects and a strong community.
mission.content: We provide support for each of our members to maximize their potential.

testimonials.subtitle: Our members' opinions about the ESOES experience

items.quote: Thanks to the ESOES club, I developed many projects and made great friendships. It's an ideal environment to improve my technical skills.

items.title: Computer Engineering Student

items.quote: The events and workshops at the club made a great contribution to my career. The networking opportunities are also amazing.

items.title: Software Developer

items.quote: Thanks to the technologies I learned at ESOES, I successfully completed my internship. I recommend it to everyone.

items.title: Frontend Developer

cta.subtitle: Apply now to develop yourself in the technology world and produce amazing projects!

company.title: ESOES
company.description: Founded by entrepreneurial ESOGÜ Engineering Faculty students, "Engineering Society of Eskişehir" (ESOES) is a student club that aims to make a difference by exploring, with a wide member profile that appeals to all engineering students.

events.title: Our Events
events.subtitle: Special events and signature projects organized by ESOES

calendar.subtitle: Follow our upcoming events and join in

events.title: HEBOCON
events.description: Hebocon is one of our signature events. It is a robot competition held with competing teams from universities in different cities of Turkey. The aim of the event is to make the worst possible robot with the parts given to the teams.

events.title: SUMMIT OF FUTURE
events.description: Summit Of Future is our signature event organized by the club every year. The aim of our event is to expand the vision of participants and inspire from the experiences of experts in their fields. Additionally, through our rich foyer area and company stands, we provide participants with the opportunity to establish professional connections.

events.title: GAME JAM
events.description: GameJam is an intensive and creative process where teams consisting of people interested in game development design and develop original digital games within a certain time period according to the determined theme. This event aims to develop participants' skills such as idea generation, software development, time management and problem solving.

events.title: TECHNICAL TRIP
events.description: Technical trips offer students the opportunity to visit factories, production facilities and various businesses operating in their fields. Through this event, participants gain experience in observing the working processes of institutions.

events.title: ESTALKS - HTALKS
events.description: EsTalks is an event that takes place with a moderator and a speaker. The speaker talks about themselves and their experiences in business life and answers the participants' questions.

events.title: SOCIAL RESPONSIBILITY TRIPS
events.description: Social responsibility trips aim to benefit society and provide a warmer environment in the club.

events.title: EDUCATION AND WORKSHOP
events.description: Our education and workshop events aim to provide useful training to participants, expand networks and create a more intimate environment in the club through fun events.

header.title: Who We Are: HUAWEI Student Developers (HSD) Eskisehir
header.description1: Founded in collaboration with Engineering Society Of Eskisehir and HUAWEI, it is a student community where students interested in software and technology come together to organize events, share knowledge, and conduct technical studies.

mission.title: OUR MISSION
mission.p1: As the HUAWEI Student Developers Team, our priority is to provide an environment especially for engineering students, and all students interested in technology, where they can learn, develop themselves in software, and gain useful practices.
mission.p2: With the events we organize, technical trainings, and project work, we offer our members opportunities for development both individually and as a team.
mission.p3: We also aim to keep up with current technologies, build a bridge between industry and students, help them gain leadership skills by taking responsibility, and create a productive, creative, and solution-oriented community culture.
